languages.text: Судя по оплавленному металлу, бывший владелец шлема не страшился ни пламени, ни смерти.
Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.
languages.original_text: Судя по оплавленному металлу, бывший владелец шлема не страшился ни пламени, ни смерти.

traits.locale_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.
Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

languages.text: Ce casque partiellement fondu suggère que son porteur ne craignait ni le feu ni la mort.
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: Ce casque partiellement fondu suggère que son porteur ne craignait ni le feu ni la mort.

languages.text: その半ば溶けた状態から判断すると、このヘルメットのかつての持ち主は火も死も恐れなかったことがうかがえる。
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: その半ば溶けた状態から判断すると、このヘルメットのかつての持ち主は火も死も恐れなかったことがうかがえる。

languages.text: Yarı erimiş hâline bakılacak olursa bu miğferin eski sahibi, ne ateşten ne de ölümden korkuyormuş.
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: Yarı erimiş hâline bakılacak olursa bu miğferin eski sahibi, ne ateşten ne de ölümden korkuyormuş.

languages.text: A juzgar por su estado medio derretido, el anterior propietario de este casco no temía al fuego ni a la muerte.
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por su estado medio derretido, el anterior propietario de este casco no temía al fuego ni a la muerte.

languages.text: 从这顶头盔半融化的状态判断，它的前任主人既不怕火，也不怕死。
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: 从这顶头盔半融化的状态判断，它的前任主人既不怕火，也不怕死。

languages.text: Geht man vom halb geschmolzenen Zustand dieses Helms aus, hatte sein einstiger Besitzer wohl keine Angst vor Feuer oder dem Tod.
languages.original_text: Judging by its half-melted state, the former owner of this helmet feared neither fire nor death.

traits.locale_text: Geht man vom halb geschmolzenen Zustand dieses Helms aus, hatte sein einstiger Besitzer wohl keine Angst vor Feuer oder dem Tod.
